com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.broadcast

Class WZBroadcast

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.broadcast.WZBroadcast

  • public class WZBroadcast
extends Object
    The WZBroadcast class is used to configure and control a live streaming broadcast.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean LOG_STAT_SAMPLES
      Set to true to log detailed information about the network performance samples gathered during a broadcast
      static boolean LOG_STAT_SUMMARY
      Set to true to log summary information at the end of a broadcast
      static boolean LOG_WOWZ_MESSAGES
      Set to true to log messages sent between the SDK and the Wowza Streaming Engine or Wowza Cloud servers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WZBroadcast()

    • Method Detail

      • startBroadcast

        public WZStatus startBroadcast(WZBroadcastConfig broadcastConfig,
                               WZStatusCallback statusCallback)
        Start a live streaming broadcast using the specified configuration
        Parameters:
        broadcastConfig - The configuration settings specified are applied to the SDK's active configuration settings before the broadcast begins.
        statusCallback - An instance of the WZStatusCallback interface which will receive broadcast status information

      • startBroadcast

        public WZStatus startBroadcast(WZBroadcastConfig broadcastConfig)
        Start a live streaming broadcast using the specified configuration
        Parameters:
        broadcastConfig - The configuration settings specified are applied to the SDK's active configuration settings before the broadcast begins.

        Stop the active live streaming broadcast
